MS MCQs

    Use Azure Lighthouse with your managed service business - Publish a managed service offer on the Azure Marketplace

    »

    1. When would you use a private plan type?

      When you want to preview a service offer before publishing it on the Azure Marketplace.

      To limit or restrict access to the service offer to named customers.

      To limit or restrict access to the service offer for Microsoft to review before publishing to the Azure Marketplace.


    2. Which type of billing model do you use for a Managed Services Offer?

      Enterprise Agreement.

      Pay-As-You-Go.

      Bring your own license.
